title: Challenger banks to face ‘tough times’, Shawbrook chief warns
text:
Welcome to your preview of The Times Subscribe now Challenger banks to face ‘tough times’, Shawbrook chief warns Iain Cornish, the former Yorkshire Building Society boss, took over as chairman at Shawbrook today PA Katherine Griffiths Banking Editor Last updated at 11:24AM, July 6 2015 
Challenger banks will face tougher times over the next few years from increased competition and harsher economic conditions, according to the new chairman of Shawbrook bank. 
Iain Cornish, the former Yorkshire Building Society boss, took over as chairman at Shawbrook today from Sir George Mathewson, the former chief executive then chairman of Royal Bank of Scotland until 2006.
